thread.title: Adobe’s Lightroom Mobile no longer requires a Creative Cloud account

title: Adobe’s Lightroom Mobile no longer requires a Creative Cloud account
text:
Adobe’s Lightroom Mobile no longer requires a Creative Cloud account 
Published By: AndroidAuthority.com - Today 
Adobe’s on-the-go photo editing app Lightroom mobile requires a $9.99 a month Creative Cloud account to use on Android at the moment, but ...
